channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: As EU waters down 2035 EV goals, electric startups express concern
item.description: The future may be electric, but that future is being postponed. The European Commission, citing the need for flexibility, has softened its ambitious plan to ban the sale of gas-powered cars by 2035. Instead of requiring 100% of new cars to be zero-emission vehicles by that date, the revised plan would allow 10% of new […]

item.title: How to watch the Royal Variety Performance 2025 online for free from anywhere
item.description: The annual charity event promises another royally good evening of entertainment, and our guide explains how to watch Royal Variety Performance 2025 online free from anywhere.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Monday, December 22 (game #925)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Monday, December 22 (game #659)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Monday, December 22 (game #1428)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: « Faire des voitures sexy » : on a demandé au patron européen du design Stellantis à quoi vont ressembler les voitures électriques de demain
item.description: Nous avons échangé avec Gilles Vidal, le nouveau responsable du design des marques européennes de Stellantis, autour d'un sujet crucial : à quoi ressembleront les voitures électriques de demain ? Entre contraintes aérodynamiques et possibilités créatives, voici sa vision.

item.title: Job killer
item.description: Park Chan-wook's 12th feature-length movie, No Other Choice, begins with Man-su (Lee Byung-hun) as a proud patriarch at the barbecue, a vision of the platonic ideal domestic life he will spend most of the movie defending. In the long middle where life is lived, the movie offers its audience mirth and pathos and deep social […]

item.title: Pour vos bonnes résolutions : la balance connectée Xiaomi n’est qu’à 15 € grâce à cette offre
item.description: La maison connectée, ce n’est pas que des ampoules ou des serrures intelligentes. C’est aussi des objets qui parlent de santé et de réalité, comme la balance Xiaomi Smart Scale S200. Multifonction, elle pèse aussi bien les objets que les personnes. Et aujourd’hui, elle fait un pas dans le bon sens côté prix : de 19,99 euros à 14,99 euros sur le site de Xiaomi. ...

item.title: New York State Just Put Itself on a Legal Collision Course with Trump’s AI Policy
item.description: Setting the stage for courtroom battles.

item.title: The Chuwi CoreBook X 7430U is a cheap but useful Windows AMD laptop - but my tests prove you'll want to upgrade it for better performance
item.description: The Chuwi CoreBook X 7430U is a low-cost laptop and tablet using a 7000 series AMD Ryzen mobile processor

item.title: The 11 best gifts under $25 for 2025
item.description: So you want to give someone a gift but you don’t have a ton of cash to spare. Don’t fret because first, you’re not alone, and second, there are tons of options to choose from. Especially if you’re looking in the tech space, it can feel especially daunting to find a gadget that’s affordable but also worth gifting — in other words, not a piece of junk that will eventually take up residence at the bottom of a drawer. But you don’t have to drain your wallet to get someone a cool gadget that will both be useful and make their lives easier. We’ve collected our favorite pieces of tech under $25 that ...

item.title: The best thing I bought this year: The Nintendo Switch 2
item.description: I waited for the Nintendo Switch 2 for a long time. Rumors of an allegedly-real-but-never-released Switch Pro swirled around for years as I watched fewer and fewer AAA third-party games make their way to Nintendo’s little console that could. There were always enough first-party titles and indie games to tide me over, but I watched […]

item.title: Forget about Robin Hood episode 9 — what comes next is a 'major escalation' for season 2
item.description: Robin Hood episode 9 isn't my favorite, but don't panic. What comes next is a major win for a potential Robin Hood season 2.

item.title: How AIM taught the internet to chat
item.description: If you were an internet user around the turn of the century, there's a good chance I could play a one-second long sound of a door opening and memories would immediately come flooding back. Memories of running home from school and logging onto AOL Instant Messenger to chat with your friends or your crush. Maybe […]

item.title: 2025: a year in art on The Verge
item.description: The Verge art team's favorite projects this year spanned the circus surrounding DOGE, the myths of the Vietnam War, the privacy crisis for trans people online, the vast surveillance network aimed at tracking down Iranian military dissidents, and much more. We built a kaleidoscope to showcase some standout products from The Verge's gift guides, sent […]...

item.title: Apple is rumored to still be facing 'technical challenges' in producing its crease-free foldable iPhone
item.description: Apple really wants its folding iPhone to be free from creases, and it may not have quite got there yet.
